topic: Request for support regarding study progress

correspondence.message:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I am in a difficult situation and am asking for support due to insufficient ECTS points for my studies. I failed a make-up exam and am about to be exmatriculated. Is there a possibility of getting another exam opportunity? If this is not possible, what should I do next? Is it still possible to switch to the Business Information Technology course?

Thank you for your help."

Good day,

please come to one of our open consultation hours without an appointment. There we can discuss your situation and evaluate possible options.

Best regards
